mapper.insert: insert into SYS_EMP (EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, LOG_NAME, LOG_PWD, LOG_STATUS, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TEL, SAL, HIREDATE, ADDR, EMAIL, MARITAL_STATUS, HEAD_IMG, CHANGE_TIME, MGR_ID, DEPT_ID, ROLE_ID ) values (#{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mgrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update SYS_EMP
EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_NAME = #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_PWD = #{logPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_STATUS = #{logStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HIREDATE = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HEAD_IMG = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGE_TIME = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MGR_ID = #{mgrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_EMP set EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_NAME = #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_PWD = #{logPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_STATUS = #{logStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HIREDATE = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEAD_IMG = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGE_TIME = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MGR_ID = #{mgrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
